name: Breath Of The Depth
description:
Welcome to Breath of the Depth! Jump into the magical underwater world and start a thrilling adventure!

Explore the real and delicate underwater world: through beautiful pictures and realistic sound effects, you feel like you are in a lifelike underwater environment. Dance with dazzling coral reefs, fascinating fish schools and mysterious jellyfish to experience the diversity of life under the sea.

Exciting quests and challenges: Complete various quests and challenges to unlock new levels and items. Fight ferocious sharks, navigate dangerous whirlpools, light up mysterious light towers, and explore the secrets of the ocean floor.

Novel movement operation: Move through the way of "swimming", allowing you to easily navigate the character and swim the sea floor. Slide the controller to move forward at will and feel the smooth game experience.

Enhance character abilities: Collect flames, pick up items, upgrade equipment, improve your character's abilities, and meet greater challenges. Unlock new skills and special abilities to become a true guardian of the underwater world.

Come play Breath of the Depth and start your adventure! Let's explore the mysteries of the underwater world and meet the endless challenges and fun!

Important note: You need an Oculus device to play this game！
